dialogues.text: (eyes still on Robin) Fine by me.  67. Kellie heads into the hallway. James and Todd follow. Bernard stands up to join the search. Robin -- pulling herself together -- sits him back down on the bed.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: You should sit down. You don’t look so good. Bernard -- takes a puff from his inhaler -- nods and eyes Robin suspiciously.

dialogues.speaker: BERNARD
dialogues.text: Go check on the girl. I’1ll be fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kellie heads into the hallway. Everyone follows... except for Bernard who lingers behind the Master Bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Abby! (to everyone) Check under all the beds. Kellie pulls Todd aside. KELLIE (cont'd) (whispers) We need to get rid of this thing.

dialogues.speaker: TODD
dialogues.text: We still need a piece of the person.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Like a part of their body?

dialogues.speaker: TODD
dialogues.text: Yeah, that and the Totem have to be destroyed together or it's no good.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: We don't have that. Is there a shortcut?

dialogues.speaker: JAMES, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (calls out) Abby!  68.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Check her room. I'll be right back. Todd dutifully heads into Abby's room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Todd opens the closet... nothing. He checks under the bed nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James searches the room. Looks behind the curtains. Nothi

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: (to Robin) Find her? Robin looks around... pulls cushions from the couch. Anything she can do.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: Not yet. She heads into the kitchen and out of sight. Kellie enter and BUMPS into James. He's starting to panic.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: Where the hell is she? (to Kellie) I should have listened to you.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: It's gonna be okay, James.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: (yelling) Robin goddammit just help me find her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Robin’s searching the pantry when she hears this. She sta up -- tears welling in her eyes. She retreats through the back of the kitchen into the hallway.  69.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kellie leans in close to James.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Dad, if this thing took her, we're not going to find her. Not like this. On James -- he can't accept it.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: She was terrified, maybe she's hiding outside.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Maybe. Let's hope so. James nods and heads out the front door as Kellie presses on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bernard bends down and checks under the bed... nothing. He stands up -- suddenly gets dizzy. Short of breath, he sits on the bed and pulls out his inhaler. Kellie enters -- 'he doesn't look so good.'

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: You doing okay? Bernard nods.

dialogues.speaker: BERNARD
dialogues.text: Just a lot to take in. You seem awful sure this isn't her. (beat) Maybe you'd be jealous if it was.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Trust me. I was never jealous of her. Kellie looks down at her wrist -- the necklace TIGHTENS around it. Whatever this is... it's coming back. She peers out the door and down the empty hallway -- 'whe the hell is Robin?'  70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Robin sits on Kellie's bed and buries her head in her hands -- fighting back tears. On the verge of letting it out. She straightens herself out a bit... looks around... she' alone. THEN... She suddenly sees her shadow on the wall -- growing in size -- illuminated by the light from a presence behind h She turns around -- a vapor begins to take shape under th trophy shelf. Then... a single trophy falls from the shelf. PLUNK. It lands on the carpet. World's Best Daughter. The LID POPS half off. The vapor disappears. Robin looks up to the shelf, then to the trophy on the floor -- 'what the fuck?' Robin bends down and picks it up. She reaches inside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kellie slowly makes her way to her room... the door open the end of the hall. Her eyes dart around... keeping a lookout...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kellie enters to find Robin sitting on the floor. In the palm of her hand -- Lexy’s wedding ring. INSERT -- an engraving inside the ring. ‘Lexy and James ~ August 9th 1998’ Kellie closes the door and slowly approaches her. Robin g up and backs away.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: Why would you have this? Why would you keep this from your Dad unless --  71.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Just, relax. Okay?

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: She's been trying to tell us this whole time.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Look, you don't know what it was like. She and Dad weren't happy. He needed someone stronger.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: What? Like you?

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Exactly like me. Robin backs into the bathroom... Kellie follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE -- the bathtub. Still full of water from earlier. Kellie sees that Robin is looking past her... back into t bedroom...

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: Stay away from me.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Don’t worry about Dad. He’s in the right hands. A GLOW fills the room... Kellie turns around... A BRIGHT presence in the air... A SHRIEK fills the room as the bright presence TURNS BLAC WIND fills the room. Backing up... Robin trips and FALLS backwards into the tu SPLASH. She HITS her head on the faucet on the way down. Unconscious... Robin's head bobs limply. BLOOD colors the water. Kellie steps forward -- places a single finger on Robin's forehead -- and PUSHES her underwater. We watch the BUBBLES stream out of Robin's nose... until they stop.  72. Kellie removes her finger... Robin floats. Absolutely sti Kellie looks around. Lexy is gone. The wind has stopped. She gets up and exits the bathroom. Robin’s profile surfa in the bathwater. Not breathing. INT. KELLIE’S BEDROOM - CONTINUOUS Kellie picks up the ‘World’s Best Daughter’ trophy and places it back on the shelf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Todd's growing impatient -- 'I can't just sit here.' Todd reaches for the door -- but Kellie opens it first. S enters the room... faking a panic.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Don't go out there. It killed Robin.

dialogues.speaker: TODD
dialogues.text: Oh my God. Kellie nods -- feigning sadness. TODD (cont'd) We have to get out of here. Todd reaches for the window. Kellie rushes over to him an places her hands on top of his -- stopping him.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Wait! Robin was trying to leave too... when it got her. Let’s just figure this out. She paces the room... thinking. Then... she looks to the of Lexy's stuff on the bedside table. KELLIE (cont'd) What was that you were saying? Part of the body? She sits on the bed, opens the box and pulls out the LOCK LEXY'S HAIR. KELLIE (cont'd) A piece of the person?  73. She looks down at the box. KELLIE (cont'd) All I have to do is drop the necklace in and...

dialogues.speaker: TODD
dialogues.text: ... destroy it. At the same time. She puts the hair back in the box -- closes it -- and loo up to Todd.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: I need her in front of me. I need to see this work.

dialogues.speaker: TODD
dialogues.text: Don’t you mean ‘it?’ How do you know it’s a woman? Kellie sighs and looks up at him.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Because it’s my mother.

dialogues.speaker: TODD
dialogues.text: So that’s her necklace. Kellie stares at the necklace -- quietly reliving the memory.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: I gave it to her the day before she died. She was so happy when she got it... she thought it meant we'd stop fighting... She places the box firmly in Todd’s hands KELLIE (cont'd) Hold on to this. Don’t let it out of your sight.

dialogues.speaker: TODD
dialogues.text: Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: We need something that’1l make her show herself. Kellie heads into the hall and shuts the door behind her. Todd sits back on the bed, the box in one hand and his ph in the other.  74. ON TODD'S PHONE -- an illustration of a necklace and a pi of teeth burning together ina fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bernard -- still on the bed and short of breath -- HEARS something. A faint RATTLING. BAP. BAP. BAP. He looks to the floor. A PANEL shifts slightly. He stands up... bends down and finds a LATCH. He pulls th panel up -- it's a CRAWL SPACE. He sees Abby in the darkness below.

dialogues.speaker: ABBY
dialogues.text: Shhh!

dialogues.speaker: BERNARD
dialogues.text: What are you doing in there? Bernard takes a pull from his inhaler.

dialogues.speaker: ABBY
dialogues.text: Kellie told me to hide.

dialogues.speaker: BERNARD
dialogues.text: What? Come on out. Kellie enters the room.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Pull the panel shut, Abby. It's not safe yet. Abby's hand emerges from the hole and pulls the panel shu

dialogues.speaker: BERNARD
dialogues.text: What the hell do you think you're doing? Wheezing heavily... he lifts the inhaler towards his mout Kellie gently reaches out and PRIES it from his hands.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Let me help you with that.

dialogues.speaker: BERNARD
dialogues.text: (gasping) I always knew there was something wrong with you.  75.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: (fake panic) Abby stay down there! The ghost is hurting Bernard! Bernard reaches out to grab his inhaler. She takes a step back and presses the button, letting all the vapor out... HISSSSS. Bernard gasps for air... but it's not coming. Bernard flops onto his belly and starts CRAWLING into the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kellie leisurely trails after Bernard as he crawls away.

dialogues.speaker: BERNARD
dialogues.text: Last thing she said to me... she thought you liked your father a little too much. His breaths turn short and hiccup-y. He finally gives up rolls back over. BERNARD (cont'd) You always were a Daddy's girl.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: I'm really sorry. This whole thing got screwed up. But you have to understand... I'm just trying to keep everyone together. Bernard looks up at her... his eyes wounded and betrayed he STOPS BREATHING. She bends over and respectfully closes his eyes with her fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kellie heads back into the bedroom and pulls the crawl sp panel open.

dialogues.speaker: ABBY
dialogues.text: Did I do a good job?  76.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: (smiles) You did great. She PULLS Abby out of the space and into the room. KELLIE (cont'd) I just needed to make sure you were safe from the ghost.

dialogues.speaker: ABBY
dialogues.text: I didn't make a noise even when Dad called.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Don't beat yourself up. She gets parental and serious. KELLIE (cont'd) Remember, all Dad needs to know is that you’re scared of this thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kellie picks Abby up and steps over Bernard as they head into the hall.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Don’t look down, okay? You don’t need to see this. Abby closes her eyes. INT. ABBY’S ROOM - NIGHT Kellie enters as Todd paces nervously -- dutifully holdin the box.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Look, I found Abby but my Dad will be back any second. I need you to keep him distracted while I get rid of this thing. She takes the box from him.

dialogues.speaker: TODD
dialogues.text: How?  77.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: I don’t know. Just keep him outside.

dialogues.speaker: TODD
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: What do you mean “no?”

dialogues.speaker: TODD
dialogues.text: We need to tell him it’s her. If this thing killed Robin he needs to know who it is.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Why are you doing this?

dialogues.speaker: TODD
dialogues.text: Because it’s the right thing to do. You don’t have anything to hide. Todd reaches for the door. Kellie BLOCKS him. TODD (cont'd) You think I’1l always just do what you say, don’t you? On Kellie -- sad but determined.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: That’s what you’re here for. Kellie PULLS Todd in for a kiss. KELLIE (cont'd) (whispers) So people don’t ask questions about me. Todd accepts the kiss .. he’s been waiting for so long fo this moment... but a second after their lips connect his eyes widen. BULGING. He pulls away in pain. We pull around to reveal the THREE PRONGED GARDEN TROWEL embedded in his back. KELLIE (cont'd) I really like you Todd. But we could never be together. I belong to someone else. She pulls the trowel out of Todd’s back... and advances towards him.  78.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Robin floats in the bath -- her face breaking the water. moving. TAP. A drop of water falls from the shower head and lands her forehead. TAP. Another one. We hear a small underwater POP... the tub finally starts drain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front door opens and James steps inside. Kellie exits Abby's room and RUSHES into his arms.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Thank God you’re back! James looks down and sees Abby. Kellie pulls away from him as he kneels down and puts his arms on Abby’s shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: Where the hell were you?

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: We need to get out of here right now. James looks past Kellie into the hallway and sees Bernard the floor.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: Oh my God, Bernard!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James tentatively approaches Bernard's body -- still seve meters away. Kellie jumps in front of James -- blocking his progress. Right in front of Abby's open door.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: This thing got everyone. If we stay any longer we --  79.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: Where... where’s Robin?

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Dad, let’s go.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: (shouting) Robin! He opens his mouth to call out again but stops once he turns... and sees Todd's BODY in Abby's room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James enters and kneels beside Todd. He looks up at Kelli

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: You're telling me this thing... did this?

dialogues.speaker: ABBY
dialogues.text: That’s why Kellie told me to hide in the crawl space.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Abby! Confused, James looks from Abby to Kellie.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: Wait... you told her to hide?

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: I didn’t want it to know where she was.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: Why not just get her out of the house like I asked? James sees Abby in the doorway gazing at Todd’s corpse. JAMES (cont'd) (to Abby) Don’t come in here. James rises to his feet -- stares Kellie square in the ey JAMES (cont'd) Where is she?  80. On Kellie -- she can’t come up with an answer. She sees James’ face fall as he takes a step away from her.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Why are you looking at me like that? James -- speechless -- pushes past her on his way to the door. Kellie GRABS his arm but James PULLS AWAY. Desperate -- Kellie grabs a SNOW GLOBE from Abby's dresse SMASHES James in the head with it. GLASS and WATER fly through the air. James hits the ground -- out cold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James wakes up in a haze. Everything’s blurry. He STRUGGL to stand up. REVEAL -- James is tied to a chair. The box is on the floor. Kellie DOUSES it with LIGHTER FLUID.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: (muttering to herself) Come on, Mom. You’ve been showing up every five fucking minutes. Where are you when we really need you? Abby sits in the corner -- scared but dutifully holding a CHARCOAL LIGHTER.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: (groggy ) Why would you... (sees the lighter fluid) What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Oh, you’re awake. (re: the box) I’m making us safe again. (off his look) Don’t worry, I'll be careful.  81.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: It’s her, isn’t it? Kellie sighs and nods reluctantly -- ‘yes.’ JAMES (cont'd) She knew we’d be in danger when Robin moved in. From you.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: That's ridiculous. I wouldn't hurt you. I protected you. I’ve been protecting you for years. I got rid of the drama. I got rid of the yelling. Think about how much happier we all were once she... left.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: You killed her.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: I pushed her. Gravity did the rest. She catches James looking at the necklace wrapped around forearm. The bruises. The blood. KELLIE (cont'd) I’m sorry, I didn’t want you to know it was her. James breaks down in tears. KELLIE (cont'd) Don't be sad! This is totally fixable! We'll go back to the way it was. Just us. You, me and Abby. No Mom, no Robin... (genuine) Weren't the past five years great?

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: (calls out) Robin! Robin!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last of the water has drained from the tub. Robin lay soaking on the bare porcelain.  82.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kellie grabs the lighter from Abby.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: (to James) What is it you don’t understand! We don’t need her.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: (calls out again) Robin!

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: She can’t hear you. Kellie’s ready to torch the box. Her eyes scan the room f any sign of Lexy as she CLICKS the lighter.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: Why don’t we stop and figure this out together?

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Where have I heard that before?

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: Please. Let me fix this.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: No. You’re not good at that. Without me, Mom would have destroyed this family years ago. Kellie grabs Abby’s hand and pulls her close. KELLIE (cont'd) (to Abby) I need you to cry out for her. Cry out for Mom.

dialogues.speaker: ABBY
dialogues.text: But what if she’s listening to you now? She knows what you’re doing. Kellie closes her eyes and sighs -- ‘goddammit.’

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: You're right. Kellie pulls the necklace off her arm and WRAPS IT AROUND ABBY'S NECK.  83. KELLIE (cont'd) Let’s see if she cares about you as much as I do. Kellie sees James’ eyes widen as he looks past her. Something’s behind her. Kellie releases Abby and turns to see... Robin. Soaking w Bloodshot eyes. Pissed off.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: It’s over, Kellie. Kellie DIVES for the box. Robin quickly approaches and SNATCHES it out of her hands. Kellie jumps to her feet.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: No! Don’t! Robin lets the box fall to the floor and STOMPS on it. Th BOX SHATTERS.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: I’m so sick of you. Talking about how you protect them. Kellie crawls on her knees -- grabbing the lock of hair a trying to get as many pieces of the box as she can. ROBIN (cont'd) You don’t give a shit about protecting them. You want to possess them. Kellie gets back on her feet and takes a step towards Abb

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: (fuming) That is not true.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: Abby, come here. Abby takes a step away from Kellie towards Robin.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: (hurt ) Abby... seriously? Abby pauses and looks at Kellie.  84.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: Abby, listen to Robin. Kellie -- utterly lost -- looks to James. JAMES (cont'd) We're going to get you some help, Kellie. Confused -- she takes a step towards him. JAMES (cont'd) You’re not well. Kellie takes another step.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: (realizing) We're not going to be together anymore? (smiles) You don’t mean that.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: (a burst of emotion) You destroyed everything! Kellie LEAPS onto James -- still tied to the chair -- and wraps her arms TIGHT around him. Manic. Flailing. The first time we’ve seen her totally ou of control.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: No, I’ve done everything! I made this family! You can’t take it away from me! The room starts to shake ever so slightly. Kellie hangs o to him for dear life. She pulls him TIGHTER. He can’t breathe. Her arms slip and -- almost subconsciously -- wrap around his neck.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: Kellie, stop! The necklace once again DIGS into Kellie’s wrist. The roo SHAKES violently now. Robin GRABS HOLD of Kellie’s arm. Kellie refuses to let go. James struggles but she’s smothering him. The chair LEANS back on its rear legs.  85. WIND fills the room. DEBRIS FLIES through the air. The chair TOPPLES over -- sending Kellie flying to the floor. The shelf next to them COLLAPSES. FRAMED PICTURES the family fall onto Kellie. GLASS SHATTERS all over her. A loud CRACKING BOOM. LEXY APPEARS in specter form and hovers menacingly above family. James’ eyes widen in terror. That awful supernatural SHRIEK pierces the air. Another BOOMING SOUND... LEXY floats in front of them. Vaporous, ethereal and unmistakably her. She’s surrounded by a HAZE OF ENERGY. James’ eyes fill with tears, relief and closure. Robin comforts Abby as the little girl looks up in wonder. Kellie averts her eyes in anger and shame -- she can’t ev look at her. Lexy turns to vapor and MOVES THROUGH JAMES -- a radiant stream -- disappearing as she does so. Kellie turns to see Robin clutching Abby. Protecting her. Kellie grabs a SHARD OF GLASS from one of the shattered frames and runs after Robin -- forcing her into the hallw

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Robin SLAMS the door and backs up against the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kellie KICKS at the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Abby unties James from the chair. INT. KELLIE’S BEDROOM - CONTINUOUS Kellie KICKS the door open and slowly enters the room -- eyes searching in the dark.  86.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: Kellie... your hand. Kellie looks down at the blood dripping from her hand. Kellie RACES towards her -- the shard of glass raised hig Robin BACKS UP and SLAMS into the trophy shelf. TROPHIES TOPPLE to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: JAMES, (0.C.)
dialogues.text: Just stop! Kellie spins around -- surprised to see James in the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: KELLIE
dialogues.text: Dad? She looks him in the eye... almost pleading. KELLIE (cont'd) You replaced me. Kellie once again LUNGES at Robin and TRIPS over the ‘World’s Best Daughter’ trophy and FALLS face first towar the razor sharp sculpture in the corner. Robin reaches out to stop her.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: No no no! CLOSE on Robin's face. A sickening SHHHK as Kellie's SCRE fill the air. James rushes over to help Kellie -- but we know by the lo on his face it’s too late. He crumples to his knees, sobbing. TIGHT ON Kellie’s face. Wide-eyed shock and terror. THE CAMERA SPINS AROUND to the MIRROR opposite her. We realize she’s staring at her own reflection -- she watche as the color drains from her own face. cur TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POLICES CARS and AMBULANCES clutter the driveway.  87. EMTs attend to Robin, James and Abby. All wrapped in blankets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kellie is covered by a WHITE SHEET. Blood seeping through the center. Impaled on the sculpture she hated so much. The sheet covers her almost entirely but stops at her eye They are lifeless and wide with fear. cur TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An affluent ocean front building. TITLE - One Year Later

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James and Robin sleep in their new bed. A PHOTO their wedding day on the nightstand. WHISPERS offscreen -- Robin stirs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Robin makes her way down the hall. Tired. In her nightgow She stops outside a closed door. The whispering is LOUDER. INT. NEW APARTMENT - ABBY’S ROOM - NIGHT Robin opens the door -- startling Abby.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: You know the rules. Real friends only.

dialogues.speaker: ABBY
dialogues.text: I wasn’t talking to anyone. Lexy’s necklace dangles at her clavicle.  88.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: Come on.

dialogues.speaker: ABBY
dialogues.text: I’m serious. You’re too paranoid.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: No such thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Robin closes the door and heads back down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James wakes up and spoons Robin as she gets back into bed

dialogues.speaker: JAMES
dialogues.text: Everything alright? Robin smiles.

dialogues.speaker: ROBIN
dialogues.text: We've gotta keep an eye on that one. INT. NEW APARTMENT - ABBY’S ROOM - NIGHT Abby lays on her stomach, drifting off to sleep.

dialogues.speaker: ABBY
dialogues.text: Can you do it one more time? Beat. She smiles. ABBY (cont'd) Thanks! (sings) The itsy-bitsy spider went up the water spout... INVISIBLE FINGERS walk up her back as she sings along, pressing into her pajamas. We pan over to Lexy’s wedding ring on the bedside table. cur TO BLACK: THE END.
